metadata.synopsis: Dialog for gnome worker on the other side of the ebon lake after they were saved by player. Laridda reflects on her missing friends, who are trapped in Moonrise.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Repro steps:1. Start the game.2. loadlevel WLD_Main_A3. goto -633.35, 14.65, 316.974. Ctrl + Shift + K the rubble blocking Nere's escape.5. Nere dialogue starts - Pick the dialogue hostile to Nere. 2. Enough Nere. and 2. Lay a finger on me etc.6. killcombat the hostile Duergars.7. Speak to Beldoran, a Gnome in a bowl cut and red shirt, at -633.75, 14.65, 309.258. Goto 88.39, 49.92, -93.819. Speak to Daffy.

0.speaker: Apprentice Laridda
0.text: My friends are trapped in Moonrise, and I'm just... sitting here.

1.speaker: Apprentice Laridda
1.text: Thulla... we can't... we can't leave her like this.

2.speaker: Apprentice Laridda
2.text: Beldron said we'll head back to the city. But the others at Moonrise...

4.speaker: Apprentice Laridda
4.text: ... I can't bear to think of it.

3.speaker: Apprentice Laridda
3.text: The myconids are trying to help, but I keep seeing my friends in Moonrise - screaming.
